data.text:
@MarcTennant Gosh don’t I feel like a dh! I don’t know why but for some reason lose/loose really grinds my gears 😬
Thanks for being so good natured, and for all the important information you help to get out there!

@trig1979 Hey David - you are ok and I will do my best.

[I am a dyslexic and letters and me dont work together well - sorry.  My mum was told when I was in primary school dont aspire to anything by labouring work!  Computers are my solution.  So you can see why I make those mistakes!]

@MarcTennant Hi @MarcTennant. I appreciate your tweets a lot and I’m sorry for ignoring the important point that you make.
Apologies for being pedantic, but could you please stop writing loose when you mean lose. 
Loose = not tight
Lose = can’t find
Please. Do it for the kids!!
